comments.raw_text:
In the test == dynamic-feImage-01.svg[accelerated] pass.svg[accelerated], the test image is sometimes rendered as a starburst instead of a plain green page.  This has been seen on both Windows and Linux.

On Windows this has only been seen on Windows XP.

Samples:

http://sm-brasstacks01.mozilla.org:8100/resultserv/data/testcase/7247957/

http://sm-brasstacks01.mozilla.org:8100/resultserv/data/testcase/7141114/
comments.creator: jgriffin@mozilla.com
comments.author: jgriffin@mozilla.com
